subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: After a rider veered off course and fell more than 250 feet into a ravine, the peloton at the Giro d’Italia came to a halt over concerns the course was unsafe.
snippet: After a rider veered off course and fell more than 250 feet into a ravine, the peloton at the Giro d’Italia came to a halt over concerns the course was unsafe.
